name: The 6th International Conference on Metal Material Processes and Manufacturing
content: About ICMMPM 2024： The 2024 the 6th International Conference on Metal Material Processes and Manufacturing (ICMMPM 2024) will be held in Dubai, UAE on December 16-18, 2024\. The conference aims to strengthen the exchange of material processing and manufacturing technologies from all over the world and to show the latest research progress in the field of advanced materials and manufacturing in the world, especially metal materials. We look forward to welcoming you to Dubai, UAE in December 2024\. We believe that you will greatly enjoy this major scientific event. (For more information, you can click: www.icmmpm.org) Conference Topic: Both full research reports and work in progress reports are welcome. There will be both oral and poster sessions in ICMMPM. Topics of interest for submission include, but are not limited to: T1: Metal Alloy Materials T2: New Materials and Properties T3: Metallurgical Foundation and Technology T4: Manufacturing Engineering You can find more topic in: https://icmmpm.org/cfp.html Publication: Papers submitted to ICMMPM 2024 will be reviewed by technical committees of the conference. All accepted and registered papers will be published in the conference proceedings. And the press will submit all papers to major databases such as EI Compendex, Scopus and Scholar. How to submit: The all papers should be submitted using the submission system provided by OpenConf system or Email. 1.Submit by system: http://icmmpm.org/openconf/openconf.php 2.Email submission: You can send email to cfp@icmmpm.org Note: Please choose a way to submit, do not repeat delivery Contacts us: WeChat：15601981031 For submission and general queries: cfp@icmmpm.org
